about_the_game:
Your task is to defeat the Elms, who decided to attack this world. Skillfully combine the defense of the city and its development.

Maximum Match Randomness


Procedural system of research branches, world and enemies. Each match will be unique combinations of the world, making the game every time will be a new experience. In addition, any match can be configured in every possible way before it starts.

Deep dive into the world of the game


Pleasant musical accompaniment, deep spruce noticeable lore will help you feel the game. In addition, visual accompaniment in the form of dynamic weather, background, vegetation and cute animals will give a complete picture of the world.

Many global goals


In addition to defeating the Elms, there are many achievements, as well as competition between other players according to different statistics.

name: Wave of Elms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 300U / Intel i3-2120
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 230 / AMD R5 230 / Intel HD 515
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS FHD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel i5-3570
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1630 / AMD RX 560 / Intel ARC A380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 240 FPS 8K

short_description: Combination of roguelike and strategy in one side view game. Defend yourself against constantly attacking Elms while researching procedural research branches. Destroy the enemy or lose
